# Implementation Plan: Speckit CLI Command

**Branch**: `001-implement-speckit-plan` | **Date**: 2025-12-19 | **Spec**: /Users/besi/Code/codebuff-local/specs/001-implement-speckit-plan/spec.md
**Input**: Feature specification from `/Users/besi/Code/codebuff-local/specs/001-implement-speckit-plan/spec.md`

**Note**: This plan is generated by the `/4-speckit.plan` workflow.

## Summary

Add a first-class `/speckit` CLI command that runs the full Speckit workflow end-to-end, supports interactive clarifications, ensures required resources are present, allows concurrent CLI usage, and persists workflow artifacts to the standard project files with a CLI summary.

## Technical Context

**Language/Version**: TypeScript (Bun runtime)  
**Primary Dependencies**: Bun, React, OpenTUI  
**Storage**: Local filesystem (Speckit artifacts and metadata)  
**Testing**: Bun test runner (cli workspace)  
**Target Platform**: macOS + Linux CLI  
**Project Type**: CLI in a Bun monorepo (`cli/`)  
**Performance Goals**: First workflow response within 30 seconds; interactive prompts feel immediate (<1 second)  
**Constraints**: Keep existing CLI commands and UI surfaces intact; use the `/commands` chain; strict TypeScript (no `any`); no workarounds  
**Scale/Scope**: Single-user CLI sessions with multiple parallel commands per user

## Constitution Check
